mapper.insert:
insert into Play( p_number , p_name , p_startdate , p_closedate , p_runningtime , p_theatername , p_theateraddress , p_agency , p_ratings , p_casting , p_ticketopendate , p_plot , p_seatNumber , p_ticketprice , p_genre , p_posterUrl , p_modifyapproval , p_registrationapproval , p_firststarttime , p_secondstarttime , p_agree , t_number )
values( play_seq.nextval, #{pname }, #{pstartDate}, #{pcloseDate}, #{prunningTime }, #{ptheaterName }, #{ptheaterAddress }, #{pagency }, #{pratings }, #{pcasting }, #{pticketOpenDate}, #{pplot }, #{pseatNumber }, #{pticketPrice}, #{pgenre }, #{pposterUrl }, #{pmodifyApproval }, #{pregistrationApproval }, #{pfirstStartTime}, #{psecondStartTime }, #{pagree} , #{tnumber})
mapper.select: SELECT t_number FROM tmember WHERE t_Id = #{tId}
